body:
**### Welcome to Project CHAMP --- Centralized HealthCare Advancement and Management Project.** *** Why CHAMPmvc ?? This Is simple MVC framework develped by project CHAMP team as a tribute to open source community. It includes all bootstrap front end,object oriented php as backend and mysql as database. ABOUT C.H.A.M.P. =============== In the todayâ€™s era of digitalization Indian Healthcare System is far behind the scene. Through this project we are trying to bridge this gap by implementing, organizing, managing and controlling complete national healthcare digitally. In this project we shall create a centralized, cost-effective, technically strong system for creation and maintenance of records for citizen, doctors, hospitals and various pharmaceutical companies. This project is also step towards the most important feature of Telemedicine i.e. video conferencing with the help of WebRTC technology. Using this technology we can decrease the Telemedicine implementation cost by 63%. ### Authors and Contributors For Details About the authors guide and team members use the following medium:
